topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55123891636872063fda0000#post_55123891636872063fda0000
40mm is basically 8 gauge. And they usually load it with buck shot. 

In fact when boarding suspected pirates they usually come in teams of six each carrying one of these. As well as a 12 gauge shotgun loaded with copper slugs to take out boat engines and one M16 assault rifle for fire support.

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551239cc6368720698bf0200#post_551239cc6368720698bf0200
Honestly you know what worked for me? Setting a daily quota. Last year I demanded of myself that I write at least 1,000 words a day and I got a lot written.

Granted, most of it was crap but that is just part of the normal writing process for non-geniuses.
